<color='#306bc4'>亲爱的各位飞行员：\n\n\\u①\\u②为了.translate:
<color='#306bc4'>Dear pilots: 

\\u①\\u②To reward the pilots for their exemplary behavior in making friends and courage to explore in the Bit Universe, Big Brother Xiaoyu paid his own money to make DJ Xi Shi to give everyone benefits!

\\u③\\u④Click the "Event" button on the left side of the main page to enter the corresponding "Lucky Draw" event interface, and complete the corresponding tasks to get a chance to draw<color='#ff6464'> /color>, and draw <color='#ff6464'>vouchers</color>.

\\u⑤\\u⑥After obtaining the voucher, click on the "Event" button on the left side of the main page to enter the corresponding "Luxury Gift From Heaven" event interface, and you can <color='#ff6464'>redeem voucher</color> rewards, in addition to <color='#ff6464'>pink diamonds</color>, there are also <color='#ff6464'>⑦ yuan phone bill coupon gifts</color> waiting for you!

\\u⑧\\u⑨Best wish for you to earn a lot of money and empty Big Brother Xiaoyu's wallet!</color>

<color='#306bc4'>亲爱的各位飞行员：\n\n\\u①\\u②为感.translate:
<color='#306bc4'>Dear pilots:

\\u①\\u②To thank you all for your support to "Bit Big Bang", DJ Xi Shi and Big Brother Xiaoyu knelt and begged for the pilot exclusive benefits of participating in this data-deleting test!

\\u③\\u④All pilots reach given login conditions and can<color='#ff6464'>freely receive and inherit from the test without deleting files</color>the legendary fighter——<color= '#ff6464'> Koi Jump</color> and legendary weapons  ——<color='#ff6464'> Koi Bubble!</color>

\\u⑤\\u⑥Click the "Event" button on the left side of the main page and enter the corresponding "Login Reward" event interface, then you can participate in the event and claim rewards!

\\u⑦\\u⑧Quietly tell the pilots who participated in the last test what you got before<color='#ff6464'>the Koi Jump</color> and <color='#ff6464' >Koi Bubble</color>, has also been upgraded to legendary! If you get it again this time, it can be star upgraded when the date is not deleted!</color>

<color='#306bc4'>亲爱的各位飞行员：\n\n\\u①\\u②打碟.translate:
<color='#306bc4'>Dear pilots: 

\\u①\\u②DJ Xi Shi, when wandering in the Bit Universe, found<color='#ff6464'>four treasures!</color>Hidden in the "Limited Time Treasure Chest" on the "Store" interface!

\\u③\\u④You can use in the store<color='#ff6464'>pink diamonds to buy "Limited Time Treasure Chest Coupons"</color> to open the limited time Treasure Chest.<color='#ff6464' >Every time you open the prize pool item, it will be reduced by one</color>, even if the unlucky players draws until end, they must get a <color='#ff6464'>Legendary Equipment</color>!

\\u⑤\\u⑥Okay, DJ Xi Shi wants to continue wandering around to see if she can pick up some better treasures!Wish everyone can get it by one draw!</color>

<color='#306bc4'>亲爱的各位飞行员：\n\n\\u①\\u②欢迎.translate:
<color='#306bc4'>Dear pilots: 

\\u①\\u②Welcome everyone to explore the Bit Universe with DJ Xi Shi. DJ Xi Shi hopes that everyone can introduce this Bit Universe with infinite possibilities to more friends and let them join our pilot team!

\\u③\\u④<color='#ff6464'>Invite your friends to make an appointment</color>, DJ Xi Shi will send referral fees to the promoters of Bit Universe, <color= '#ff6464'>Massive Pink Diamonds</color> and <color='#ff6464'>Reward which will not be deleted</color> are waiting for you!

\\u⑤\\u⑥Click the "Event" button on the left side of the main page, enter the corresponding "Appointment Gift" event interface, then you can participate in the event and claim rewards!</color>

<color='#306bc4'>Dear pilots: 

\\u①\\u②Welcome everyone to explore the Bit Universe with DJ Xi Shi. DJ Xi Shi hopes that everyone can introduce this Bit Universe with infinite possibilities to more friends and let them join our pilot team!

\\u③\\u④As long as <color='#ff6464'> invite your friends to make an appointment</color>, DJ Xi Shi will send referral fees to the promoters of Bit Universe,<color ='#ff6464'>Massive Pink Diamonds</color> and <color='#ff6464'>Reward which will not be deleted</color> are waiting for you!

①、周一、三、五、日②点-③点开启大冒险，邀请好友或匹配线上玩家组成队伍才可进行.translate:
①. On Monday, Wednesday, Friday, Sunday ②-③ o’clock Great Adventure is available. Invite friends or match online players to team up to challenge. 
④. After successfully forming a team, you can select talents to apply in this Great Adventure, and you can get ⑤ initial adventure coins at the same time. 
⑥. You need to spend adventure coins to flip the grid, find the key in the grid and clear this level. 
⑦. The unused adventure coins will be emptied on the that day, and they will be exchanged into pink diamonds based on the sum of the remaining adventure coins of the two people. 
⑧. Flipping the grid can trigger events or obtain items to increase combat power. 
⑨. During the challenge skirmish, if the battle fails or withdraws from the battle halfway, it is regarded as a failure of the challenge, and the skirmish disappears and cannot be challenged again. 
⑩. You can also get keys and powerful items by defeating the boss, and can also increase the rewards in the treasure chest of the floor. 
⑪. Match up to ⑫ teams to compete, and rewards will be distributed according to the ranking of the team after the event. 
First place: Pink Diamond x⑬, Great Adventure Fighter Fragment Pack x⑭, Great Adventure Weapon Fragment Pack x⑮, Great Adventure Pet Fragment Pack x⑯, Light Wing Material Pack x⑰. 
Second place: Pink Diamond x⑱, Great Adventure Fighter Fragment Pack x⑲, Great Adventure Weapon Fragment Pack x⑳, Great Adventure Pet Fragment Pack x⑴, Light Wing Material Pack x⑵. 
Third place: Pink Diamond x⑶, Great Adventure Fighter Fragment Pack x⑷, Great Adventure Weapon Fragment Pack x⑸, Great Adventure Pet Fragment Pack x⑹, Light Wing Material Pack x⑺.

①、我们访问您的存储空间是为了向您提供游戏日志存储、图片保存及分享功能。\n\n.translate:
①. We visit your storage space to provide you with game log storage, picture storage and sharing functions. 

②. We will adopt safety protection measures that comply with industry standards to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, public disclosure, use, modification, damage or loss. We strive to use a variety of reasonable systems, technologies, procedures, and physical measures to protect your personal information, including but not limited to firewalls, encryption (such as SSL), de-identification or anonymization, and access control measures. 

③. You can check the status of your access permission to the above personal information one by one through "Settings-Others-Privacy Rights Management", and you can decide to turn on or off these permissions (we will guide you to complete it in your device system). Enabling these permissions means that you authorize us to collect and use these personal information to achieve the above functions. Turning off these permissions means that you cancel these authorizations, and we will no longer continue to collect and use your personal information, and we will not be able to provide the above-mentioned functions corresponding to these authorizations. Your decision to turn off these permissions will not affect the previous processing of personal information based on your authorization. 

④. You can check the "Tencent Game Privacy Protection Guidelines" for more detailed privacy policy information.

①、我们识别您的电话设备信息是为了保证游戏正常运行。\n\n②、我们会采用符合业.translate:
①. We identify your phone device information to ensure the normal operation of the game. 

②. We will adopt safety protection measures that comply with industry standards to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, public disclosure, use, modification, damage or loss. We strive to use a variety of reasonable systems, technologies, procedures, and physical measures to protect your personal information, including but not limited to firewalls, encryption (such as SSL), de-identification or anonymization, and access control measures. 

③. You can check the status of your access permission to the above personal information one by one through "Settings-Others-Privacy Rights Management", and you can decide to turn on or off these permissions (we will guide you to complete it in your device system). Enabling these permissions means that you authorize us to collect and use these personal information to achieve the above functions. Turning off these permissions means that you cancel these authorizations, and we will no longer continue to collect and use your personal information, and we will not be able to provide the above-mentioned functions corresponding to these authorizations. Your decision to turn off these permissions will not affect the previous processing of personal information based on your authorization. 

④. You can check the "Tencent Game Privacy Protection Guidelines" for more detailed privacy policy information.

①、根据房间层数获得奖励\n②、玩家进度层数低于房间层数时，核芯按照<color.translate:
①. According to the number of room floors to get rewards
②. When the player’s progress is lower than the room, the core rewards will be according to <color=#039c6b>room</color>
③. When the player’s progress is lower than the room, the power stone rewards will be according to the <color=#039c6b>room</color>

③. Starting from Floor ⑧, you can wear the specified faction equipment to get extra attribute bonuses.

①、玩家在异能塔中挑战的层数越高，获得的排名也越高\n②、玩家可反复刷新最高层的.translate:

①、组队需要玩家与队友合作闯关，闯关成功可获得相应奖励。\n②、每日前两次挑战可.translate:

⑤. After the death of a teammate in the game, the player can resurrect by staying at the position where the teammate died.

①）本游戏是一款飞行类游戏，适用于年满②周岁及以上的用户，建议未成年人在家长监护.translate:
①) This game is a flying game, suitable for users who are ② years old and above. It is recommended that minors use the game products under parental supervision. 

③) This game has no background, no world view, and no plot. The main gameplay is to doge and fly, and the gameplay is simple and friendly. The game is in cartoon pixel style, the character design is cute, the scene is bright, and the music is relaxing and lively. There are competitive content in the game, and the competitive method is to doge and fly, and the final score decides the victory or failure. There is a text-based social system for strangers in the game, and the management of the social system follows relevant laws and regulations. 

④) There is a real-name authentication system for users in the game, and users who are authenticated as minors will be subject to the following management:
According to relevant national requirements, there is a real-name authentication system for users in the game, and users who have not passed the real-name authentication are not allowed to enter the game; Users who are authenticated as minors are not allowed to enter the game at any time except Friday, Saturday, Sunday and statutory holidays from 5:00 to ⑥. 
Some of the gameplay and items in the game require payment. According to the management regulations of Tencent Health System, users who are authenticated as minors will be subject to the following management: 
Users under the age of ⑦ cannot pay; for above ⑧ but under ⑨ minor users, the single top-up amount shall not exceed ⑩ and the cumulative monthly top-up amount shall not exceed ⑪ RMB; for above ⑫ minor users, the single top-up amount shall not exceed ⑬ RMB, and the cumulative monthly top-up amount shall not exceed ⑭ RMB. 

⑮) In the game, the player needs to slide on screen to move the controlled aircraft left and right, doge the target and complete the shooting of the target, which helps to exercise the player's hand-eye coordination ability. During the game, the player needs to respond quickly to the sudden appearance of the target, which helps to train the player's brain response speed.

亲爱的飞行员：\n 感谢你帮忙参与比特食堂午餐系列菜品的研发，现在食堂菜品更.translate:
Dear pilot:
 Thank you for helping to participate in the research and development of Bit Canteen’s lunch series. Now the canteen’s menu has been updated. Come to the canteen for a big meal at noon and you will have sufficient AP after eating for sure!

亲爱的飞行员：\n 感谢你帮忙参与比特食堂晚餐系列菜品的研发，现在食堂菜品更.translate:
Dear pilot:
 Thank you for helping to participate in the research and development of Bit Canteen’s lunch series. Now the canteen’s menu has been updated. Come to the canteen for a big meal at noon and you will have sufficient AP after eating for sure!

亲爱的飞行员：\n感谢你替我保守这个秘密。我今天上午到达岳阳，现在正在畅游洞庭湖.translate:
Dear pilot:
Thank you for keeping this secret for me. I arrived in Yueyang this morning, and now I am swimming in Dongting Lake. The dragonflies here are so many and big, they are very delicious, but I am quite full now. 
During the lunch break, I was photographed holding a lotus leaf and enjoying the cool. The person excitedly said that he was going to post it online, maybe I was going to be famous But I hope not, after all, I slipped out, to be low-profile and low-profile. 
Oh!By the way, I remember to pour a little water on the inflatable model I put on the desk after work. If the surface is too dry, it will be noticed by the boss.

亲爱的飞行员：\n我的左爪有点麻，今天就不打算自己游汨罗江了。我跳上了一艘龙舟，.translate:
Dear pilot:
My left paw is a bit numb, so I don’t plan to swim the Miluo River by myself today. I jumped on a dragon boat, and the rowers were very happy, thinking that I could bring them good luck. Is that any more to say? So I sat on the bow and enjoyed the feeling of riding the wind and waves. It was perfect except that the drums were too loud and noisy. I'll go to watch the dragon boat race later, and send you a small gift too? 
Please put my glasses on the model and pose an expression of serious thinking when I talk about the PowerPoint in the weekly meeting in the afternoon, thank you!

亲爱的飞行员：\n昨天下了两场雨，一场在白天，一场在晚上。空气湿润得不得了，水里.translate:
Dear pilot:
There were two rains yesterday, one during the day and one at night. The air was extremely humid, and the fish in the water were flirting me, and I felt it when I stood on the shore. It was really kind, so I shared with them the soy sauce and Fried chop rice cake. 
Today is Sunday not for working, so please go to the company in advance, take out the inflatable model in blue clothes in my storage box, replace the one from yesterday, don’t forget to water it.

亲爱的飞行员：您参与的回归有礼活动，有遗忘的奖励未领取，请及时查收。.translate: Dear pilots: You have participated in the return reward event. If you have forgotten rewards, please check them in time.

关卡规则：\n①、②名玩家合作挑战异能塔关卡。\n③、可点击列表中的任意房间加入.translate:
Level rules:
①、② Players cooperate to challenge the power tower level. 
③. You can click any room in the list to join the challenge. 
④. You can directly match players to challenge levels randomly through "Quick Join". 
⑤、You can open a new room through "Create Room" and invite friends to challenge the level. 
⑥. The maximum number of floors available for creating a room depends on the progress of the host’s single-player power tower’s progress. 

Battle rules:
"Normal floor" battle rules:
⑦. You can get points by destroying enemies in the battle. The higher the points, the higher the level ratings. 
⑧. If every wave of enemies is not destroyed within a certain time, the enemies will disappear automatically and you will not be able to get points. 
⑨. ⑩ points will be deducted if the player is shot down during the battle. 
⑪. After the battle, the corresponding reward will be given based on the final evaluation. 
⑫. After a teammate in the game is shot down, the player can resurrect by staying at the position of the teammate. 
⑬. ⑭ points or less, the rating is B
⑮. ⑯~⑰ points, rating is A
⑱. ⑲ points or more, rating is S


 Output description:
⑳. Get rewards according to the number of floors in the room . 
⑴ When the player floor progress is lower than the room floor, player will get rewards according to the player floor progress. 
⑵ You can get an additional "Team Treasure Chest" reward when you form a team.

关卡规则：\n①、通关主线②章后开启异能塔。\n③、普通关卡：初始立即解锁④-⑤.translate:
Level rules: 
①. After clearing the main story Chapter ②, the power tower is available. 
③. Ordinary level: Initially unlock level ④-⑤ immediately, and unlock the next ⑥-floor level after passing the power challenge level. 
⑦. The power challenge level does not consume AP, and the challenge floor disappears after passing the level. 

"Common floor" battle rules:
⑧. You can get points by destroying enemies in battle. The higher the points, the higher the level rating.
⑨. If each wave of enemies is not destroyed within a certain time, the enemy will automatically disappear and you cannot get points
⑩. ⑪ points will be deducted if the player is shot down during the battle. 
⑫. After the battle, the corresponding reward will be given according to the final rating
⑬. ⑭ points or less, the rating is B
⑮. ⑯~⑰ points, the rating is A 
⑱. ⑲ points or more, rating is S

Reward description:
⑴ The normal floor of the power tower may drop different cores, core upgrade materials, gold coins, etc.
⑵ The power stone and power stone experience, etc can be obtained in the level rating treasure chest.
⑶ The higher the floor of the power tower, the better the quality of the dropped items, and the more quantity

【Copper skin and iron armor】Enemies get shields
【Blasting Legacy 】A barrage will be generated when the critically hit enemy dies
【This will reduce and the other will grow】The lower the player’s HP, the faster the enemy's speed.
【The bad to bully the good】The enemy dodges the pet’s normal attack
【Stubbornness】The enemy does not trigger the player’s ejection and penetration
【Does not talk about martial virtue 】The enemy’s attack ignores the player’s armor
【Frost Shell】The enemy is immune to freezing effects, the burning effect +⒀
【Flame retardant shell】The enemy is immune to burning effects, Freezing effect+⒁
【Insulation shell】 Enemies are immune to lightning effects, and critical strike damage +⒂
【Microcosm】Enemies are reduced in size ⒃

【Frost Shell】The enemy is immune to freezing effects, the burning effect +⒀
【Flame retardant shell】The enemy is immune to burning effects, Freezing effect+⒁
【Insulation shell】 Enemies are immune to lightning effects, and critical strike damage +⒂
【Microcosm】Enemies are reduced in size ⒃

Level rules: 
①. After clearing the main story Chapter ②, the power tower is available. 
③. Ordinary level: Initially unlock level ④-⑤ immediately, and unlock the next ⑥-floor level after passing the power challenge level. 
⑦. The power challenge level does not consume AP, and the challenge floor disappears after passing the level. 

"Common floor" battle rules:
⑧. You can get points by destroying enemies in battle. The higher the points, the higher the level rating.
⑨. If each wave of enemies is not destroyed within a certain time, the enemy will automatically disappear and you cannot get points
⑩. ⑪ points will be deducted if the player is shot down during the battle. 
⑫. After the battle, the corresponding reward will be given according to the final rating
⑬. ⑭ points or less, the rating is B
⑮. ⑯~⑰ points, the rating is A 
⑱. ⑲ points or more, rating is S

Reward description:
⑴ The normal floor of the power tower may drop different cores, core upgrade materials, gold coins, etc.
⑵ The power stone and power stone experience, etc can be obtained in the level rating treasure chest.
⑶ The higher the floor of the power tower, the better the quality of the dropped items, and the more quantity

Sweeping instructions:

【Copper skin and iron armor】Enemies get shields

【Stubbornness】The enemy does not trigger the player’s ejection and penetration
【Does not talk about martial virtue 】The enemy’s attack ignores the player’s armor
【Frost Shell】The enemy is immune to freezing effects, the burning effect +⒀
【Flame retardant shell】The enemy is immune to burning effects, Freezing effect+⒁
【Insulation shell】 Enemies are immune to lightning effects, and critical strike damage +⒂
【Microcosm】Enemies are reduced in size ⒃

吃的时候不要捏得太紧。.translate: Don't pinch too tightly when eating.

异能石成就点获取规则：\n\n①.每获得一枚优秀/精良/史诗/史诗（套装）/传说.translate:
Power stone achievement point acquisition rules:

①. Each time you get an excellent/sophisticated/epic/epic (outfit)/legendary power stone, you can get ②/③/④/⑤/⑥ power stone achievement points respectively 

⑦. Obtaining power stones of the same name repeatedly will not increase power stone achievement points

⑧. Each completed set of ⑨-piece epic power stone can get ⑩ power stone achievement points
 
⑪. Each completed set of ⑫-piece legendary power stone set, you can get ⑬ power stone achievement points

⑭. Only upgrade the power stone level in the current season to get the power stone achievement points
 
⑮. Each time you increase the level of a power stone, you will get ⑯ power stone achievement points, which are calculated based on the highest level power stone in the same part.

⑰. Decompose the power stone to make the highest level of the power stone of the same part is lowered, the achievement point of the power stone will also be reduced.

⑱. The reward will be sent by mail at the end of the season, and all power stones and power stone upgrade experience will be cleared.

怪物图鉴：\n①、首次击败怪物可以激活对应怪物的图鉴。\n②、激活图鉴可以提升对.translate:
Monster Bestiary:
①. Defeating a monster for the first time can activate the corresponding monster's Bestiary. 
②. Activating Bestiary can increase the damage of the corresponding monster when it is hit. 

Equipment Bestiary:
③. You can activate the Bestiary after getting new equipment. 
④. The Bestiary can be upgraded after the equipment is upgraded. 
⑤. Activate or upgrade the Bestiary to get a 3D attribute value bonus.

怪物图鉴：\n①、首次击败怪物可以激活对应怪物的图鉴。\n②、激活或升级图鉴可以.translate:
Monster Bestiary:
①. Defeating a monster for the first time can activate the corresponding monster's Bestiary. 
②, Activating or upgrading the Bestiary can increase the damage of the corresponding monster when it is hit. 

Equipment Bestiary:
③. You can activate the Bestiary after getting new equipment. 
④. The Bestiary can be upgraded after the equipment is upgraded. 
⑤. Activate or upgrade the Bestiary to get a 3D attribute value bonus. 

Bestiary of Power Stones:
⑥. The Bestiary can be activated after obtaining new power stones. 
⑦. After the power stone upgrades stars, the Bestiary can be upgraded. 
⑧. Activating or upgrading the Bestiary can get 3D attribute value bonus.

排名规则：\n①、当玩家连胜中断后，再次挑战可重新刷新连胜纪录\n②、“竞技场”.translate:
Ranking rules:
①. When the player's winning streak is interrupted, the player can challenge again to refresh the winning streak
②. The number of winning streak in the "Arena" and "Season PK" will be calculated separately, and the highest winning streak will be used for ranking
③. The more winning streak a player has in the "Arena" and "Season PK", the higher the ranking.
④The ranking will be based on the player's highest winning streak of the week.
⑤The ranking will be cleared every Sunday ⑥ o’clock, player rankings and winning streaks will be cleared
Weekly settlement:
⑦. The leaderboard will be settled every Sunday at ⑧ o’clock
⑨. The leaderboard will be locked after settlement, and stop updating
⑩. All player records will not be counted during the suspension period
⑪. Rewards will be sent to the mailbox by email, please pay attention to check

排名规则：\n①、挑战模式累计获得星星越多排名越高。\n②、星星数量相同，则通关.translate:
Ranking rules:
①. The more stars you get in challenge mode, the higher the ranking. 
② If the number of stars is the same, the higher the chapter in the challenge mode, the higher the ranking. 
③. If the chapter is the same, the one with the shorter time to complete the chapter will rank higher. 
Reward settlement:
④. Daily rewards will be settled on the night ⑤:⑥, and the rewards will be sent to the mailbox by email. 
⑦. The ultimate reward will be settled on the last day of the event ⑧:⑨. The reward will be sent to the mailbox by email, please check it carefully. 
⑩. After the final settlement, the leaderboard will be locked and the update will stop.

Ranking rules:
①. The more stars you get in challenge mode, the higher the ranking. 
② If the number of stars is the same, the higher the chapter in the challenge mode, the higher the ranking. 
③. If the chapter is the same, the one with the shorter time to complete the chapter will rank higher. 
Reward settlement:
④. Daily rewards will be settled on the night ⑤:⑥, and the rewards will be sent to the mailbox by email. 
⑦. The ultimate reward will be settled at ⑧ o’clock on the last day of the event. The reward will be sent to the mailbox by email, please check it carefully. 
⑨. After the final settlement, the leaderboard will be locked and the update will stop.

排名规则：\n①、排行榜将取玩家本周最高连胜纪录进行排名\n②、当玩家连胜中断后.translate:
Ranking rules:
①. The leaderboard will take the player’s highest winning streak this week for ranking
②. When the player's winning streak is interrupted, challenge again to refresh the winning streak
③. The more winning streak a player has in the "Arena" and "Season PK", the higher the ranking.
④. The leaderboard will be cleared every Sunday at ⑤ o’clock, and the player’s ranking and winning streak will be cleared.
 Weekly settlement:
⑥. The leaderboard will be weekly settled every Sunday ⑦ o’clock
⑧. The leaderboard will be locked after settlement, and will stop updating
⑨. All player records will not be counted during the suspension period
⑩. Rewards will be sent to the mailbox by email, please pay attention to check

排名规则：\n①、排行榜将取玩家本次大冒险层数进行排名\n②、玩家层数越高则排名.translate:
Ranking rules:
①. the leaderboard will be ranked based on the player’s floor of this adventure
②. The higher the player’s floor, the higher the ranking. If the player’s floor is the same, the player with the more total remaining adventure coins in the team will be ranked higher. If the total number of remaining adventure coins of the player is the same, the sooner the player reaches the highest floor, the sooner the player will be ranked higher
③. The leaderboard will be cleared two hours before the next great adventure starts, and the player ranking and challenge record will be cleared
④. Player’s each ranking is calculated independently and will not affect each other.
Ranking settlement:
⑤. The ranking will be settled at ⑥ on the day the adventure starts.
⑦. After settlement, the ranking will be locked and will stop updating
⑧ During the suspension period, players can check the last leaderboard record
⑨. And rewards will be sent to the mailbox by email, please pay attention to check

②. The ranking will be based on the total number of items picked up in the "Arena" and "Season PK"
③. The leaderboard will be cleared at ④ every Sunday, and the player ranking and item pickup records will be cleared.

⑧. All player records during the suspension period will not be counted
⑨. Rewards will be sent to the mailbox by email, please pay attention to check

装备成就点获取规则：\n\n①.每提升一级巅峰等级获得②点装备成就点\n\n③..translate:
Equipment achievement points acquisition rules:

①. Each time you increase your peak level, you will get ② equipment achievement points

③. Each time you complete the bounty mode-extreme trial, you will get ④ equipment achievement points

⑤. Equipment achievement points must be obtained at the peak level of equipment upgraded in the current season

⑥. Repeatedly increasing the peak level of the same piece of equipment will not get equipment achievement points repeatedly

⑦. There are multiple pieces in each part to increase the peak level when the equipment is equipped, the equipment achievement points are calculated according to the equipment with the highest peak level

⑧. When the equipment is decomposed or extracted and the highest peak level of the equipment in the same part is reduced, the equipment achievement points will also drop

⑨. The reward will be sent by email at the end of the season, and the peak level and peak upgrade experience materials of all equipment will be cleared at that time.

规则说明：\n①、异能石分为星石、日石、月石三种，星石有上、下、左、右四个部位。.translate:
Rule description:
①. There are three types of power stones: star stone, sunstone, and moonstone. The star stone has four parts: up, down, left, and right. 
②. The pilots wear the ③~④ star stones of different parts in the same set to activate the powerful set skills. 
⑤. Sunstone and Moonstone have exclusive skills, when wearing the ⑥ pieces of star stone set, the exclusive skills will be activated. 
⑦. The power stone can unlock star affixes and get special attribute bonuses after star upgrade 
⑧. The basic attribute panel of the power stone displays the value, which is the total value of the basic attribute of all the worn power stones and unlocked affixes. 

How to get:
⑨. Pilots can challenge the power tower to randomly obtain four star stones in the S rating treasure chest. 
⑩. The pilot can obtain the Sunstone and Moonstone after clearing the "Power Challenge". 

Notes:
⑪. Collect power stones and upgrade power stones to obtain power stone achievement points, which can be used to win luxurious rewards in season challenge events. 
⑫. All power stones and power stones upgrade materials will be recycled at the end of the season.

规则说明：\n①、每天可免费进行②场竞技对战，超过③场后，当天再进行竞技匹配时需.translate:
Rule description: 
①. ② competition battles can be played for free every day, after exceeding ③, the diamonds will be consumed when start competition matching on the same day. 
④. In the battle, you will compete with another player for the score of defeating monsters, and the player with the highest score will win. 
⑤. After winning, you can get diamonds and rank points. Accumulating rank points can improve your rank. 
⑥. Different ranks can get different ranks of weekly settlement rewards (need to play at least one game in a week). 
⑦.The rewards for rank settlement will be settled at ⑧ every Sunday and sent to the mailbox by email. Rank settlement reward emails have a certain validity period, please check them in time. 
⑨. When the player reaches a certain rank for the first time, they can receive the achievement rewards of the corresponding rank. 
⑩. Playing ⑪ rounds of competitive battles can receive corresponding active rewards. 
⑫. The power stone will not take effect in the arena . 

In-game item description:
⑬. Fire interference: After use, an area that reduces the opponent's fire output will be formed around the fighter, which can effectively reduce the opponent's score. 
⑭. Flame burning: After use, a flame area is formed around the fighter, and the opponent will receive continuous burning damage in the area. 
⑮.Point-reducing strike: After the player uses it, they will summon a fist from the screen. If the fist successfully hits the opponent, it will cause a certain amount of damage and can grab a certain score from the opponent.

规则说明：\n①、玩家可以选择不同的房间，然后消耗一定数量的赛季币进行pvp对战.translate:
Rule description: 
①. Players can choose different rooms, and then consume a certain amount of season coins for pvp battles. 
②. In the battle, you need to compete with your opponent for the score of defeating monster, and the one with the highest score wins. 
③. After winning, you can get Season Coins and Season Points. After the rank points reach a certain value, you can open more advanced rooms. 
④. Advanced rooms can get more season coins and season points (play at least one game in a week). 
⑤. Players will be ranked according to their season points. After the season is over, the ranking rewards will be sent to the mailbox by email. 
⑥. Players who obtain certain season points for the first time in the season can receive corresponding achievement rewards. 
⑦. Every week by Season PK, You can get <color=#f99800>⑧</color> Season Coins. <color=#FF5B5B>If you exceed the upper limit, you will no longer get more Season Coins</color>, but you can still get Season coins consumed for admission, and point rewards can be normally obtained. 
⑨. When the season coin obtained reaches the upper limit, using the pink diamond to enter the battle will not receive the season coin reward. 

In-game item description:
⑩. Fire interference: After use, an area that reduces the opponent's firepower output is formed around the fighter, which can effectively reduce the opponent's score. 
⑪. Icicles: After use, multiple areas are formed around the fighter, and the opponent will be damaged by falling icicles continuously in the area. 
⑫. Cross ice spur: After the player uses it, it will release a cross-shaped ice spur around himself as the center. After hitting the opponent, it will cause a certain amount of damage and can grab a certain score from the opponent.

规则说明：\n①、赏金玩法需要花费对应各个模式的挑战券进行挑战，每日②点各个模式.translate:
Rule description: 
①. Bounty gameplay requires the challenge coupon corresponding to each mode to challenge. Every day at  ② each mode will recover one challenge coupon, but the maximum limit cannot be exceeded. 
③. You can unlock more advanced bounty modes through level upgrades and increase the number of output resources. 
④. Click the level button of each mode to view the resource output of different levels. 
⑤. You can choose to consume multiple challenge coupons to obtain multiple resource output. 
⑥. Challenge coupons will not be deducted when the challenge fails. 

Output description:
Refined Treasure: Core Experience Material
Flight Trial: Equipment Experience Material
Gold Mine: Gold Coin
Power Institute: Power Stone Experience
Extreme Trial: Peak Upgrade Materials

Unlocking conditions:
Refined Treasure: Pilot level reaches LV⑦ to unlock
Flight Trial: Pilot level reaches LV⑧ to unlock
Gold Mine: Pilot level reaches LV⑨ to unlock
 Power Research Institute: The pilot reaches LV⑩ to unlock the power tower
Extreme Trial: The pilot reaches LV⑪ and open the power tower to unlock
